task.title: Fix output buffer overflow with RangeError

events.content: Used sliding window approach for buffer management: Used sliding window approach for buffer management

raw.question: Used sliding window approach for buffer management
raw.chosen: Used sliding window approach for buffer management
raw.reasoning: Keeps last 10MB of output, trims from start, adjusts lastParsedLength to maintain parsing sync. Alternative was file-based storage but too complex for the use case.

retrospective.summary: Fixed unbounded output buffer growth causing RangeError. Added MAX_OUTPUT_BUFFER_SIZE (10MB) sliding window with lastParsedLength sync. Added 6 comprehensive tests.
